title: Improved methanogenesis from aqueous pyrolysis liquid (APL) by inoculum selection and pre-ozonation
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00768E, Paper
Saba Seyedi, Kaushik Venkiteshwaran, Daniel Zitomer
APL from municipal wastewater solids (WWS) pyrolysis can be converted to methane by acclimated anaerobic microbes under specific conditions.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
